document_data.name: Pagnola
document_data.mainbody: '''Pagnola''' was a [[healer]] member of the [[Flaming Fist]] who served the city of [[Baldur's Gate]] in late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: Pagnola was a [[gold dwarven]] woman with a fair skin, clean-shaven face, and brown eyes. She wore a uniform of the Flaming Fist: a [[helmet]], a set of [[splint mail]], and a [[tabard]] adorned with the Flaming Fist insignia. She wielded a [[mace]] and [[shield]] in battle.
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1492}}, Fist Healer Pagnola was stationed in the [[Baldur's Gate/Lower City|Lower City]] of Baldur's Gate, where she patrolled the streets near the [[Blushing Mermaid]].
